name: Crazy Market
description:
Crazy Market is the free-to-play game that will put the smile back on your face!
Take control of the pretty Lulu or the dynamic Eugene and take position behind the cash register from the biggest supermarket in town.
But the task won’t be so easy: The Boss is pretty nuts and won’t hesitate to throw bombs directly on the conveyor belt, where customers may also forget their babies or even their cute little doggies! Hopefully you can use any of the 6 super-boosters to make your life easier.
Can you make it through the whole three months at the supermarket before your well-earned holidays under the sun?

• 110 levels scattered on 60 days
• 12 useful boosters and upgrades
• 108 different items and their catalog cards to collect
• 11 trophies and 1 leaderboard
• 1 insanely crazy moustached manager

1 player(s)
Network Features
4096KB Minimum
Touchscreen

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online activity subject to Terms of Services and User Agreement (www.playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service).
